headline: Better Energy Stock: Diamondback Energy vs. Chevron
summary: Chevron's integrated business and its rock-solid balance sheet help secure its dividend.  Diamondback Energy is a well-run oil and gas company that offers good upside due to the potential for higher oil prices.  Comparing a pure-play exploration and production in the Permian Basin, Diamondback Energy (NASDAQ: FANG), with an integrated energy major, Chevron (NYSE: CVX), sheds light on many of the questions that oil and gas-focused investors face in the coming years.
